name: high5-learning-backend
description: This is the backend repository (npm project) for high-five-learning. Hight-five-learning is a elearning platform created by TUM students for the course Software Engineering für betriebliche Anwendungen – Masterkurs: Web Application Engineering (IN2087).
author: Andre Landgraf, Hermann Grübel, Andre Weinkötz, Martin Lindemann
